title: Chris Gaskell
text: Chris Gaskell is a Senior Clinical Psychologist in Neuropsychology in the UK. When not working clinically he tends to been seen talking about his rescue dog (Leo) and making futile attempts at programming/web development.

title: Chris Gaskell
text:
Education
University of Sheffield, UK | DClinPsy in Clinical Psychology | Sept 2018 - Sept 2021
University of Chester, UK | BSc in Psychology | Sept 2010 - Sept 2013

title: Chris Gaskell
text:
Experience
NHS | Senior Clinical Psychologist | August 2022 - present
IndigoNeuro | Associate Psychologist | August 2020 - present
North West Neurotherapeutics | Associate Psychologist | August 2023 - present

title: NeuroPsyTools Apps
text:
¬These apps are all developed using Shiny, a web application framework for R that allows for the creation of interactive, user-friendly web applications. Shiny apps enable users to input data, adjust parameters, and view results in real time, making them particularly useful for data analysis, visualization, and reporting.
These apps were created with limited developer time, so please be sure to read the disclaimers and use them at your own risk. If you notice anything amiss, feel free to leave a courteous message.
We’d love to hear your ideas for new clinical psychology apps, so don’t hesitate to reach out!














Score Converter


Score Converter is a shiny app that allows users to convert single test scores (using a web interface) or large batteries of test results (using spreadsheet upload). A suite…













Reliable Change


Calculate reliable change indices (RCIs) for neuropsychological tests to assess significant changes in cognitive performance over time. A range of methodological approaches…











Divergence


A Shiny App designed for the assessment of single cases, providing clinicians and researchers with functionalities to determine if there are deficits, discrepancies, or…

The website is currently divided into into Apps and (External) Resources - watch this space for future pages!
